TapeQualityAssessor¶

class quality_assessment.quality_assessor.TapeQualityAssessor(tape_quality_info: quality_assessment.tape_quality_information.TapeQualityInformation, tape_specs: quality_assessment.data_types.TapeSpecs)[source]¶

Class for assessing whether specs for various quality parameters are met.

Methods

TapeQualityAssessor.__init__(...)

TapeQualityAssessor.assess_average_value()

Assesses if average value meet the specs.

TapeQualityAssessor.assess_dropouts()

Assesses if drop-outs meet the specs.

TapeQualityAssessor.assess_meets_specs()

Kicks off assessment for various quality parameters and stores quality reports.

TapeQualityAssessor.assess_min_value()

Assesses if minimum values meet the specs.

TapeQualityAssessor.determine_ok_tape_section(...)

Determines all tape section that do not contain defects and are long enough

TapeQualityAssessor.plot_defects()

Shows plot in a window.

TapeQualityAssessor.plot_dropout_histogram()

Plots Histogram of drop-out widths (Just to show what kind of statistics can be done).

TapeQualityAssessor.print_reports()

print all available quality reports to the shell.

TapeQualityAssessor.save_pdf_report([to_dir])

Creates PDF report for the tape and saves it.
